sqlMap.statement: SELECT UC.COND_VAL_TXT_01 AS COND_STR_1 , UC.ATTRB_COND_VAL_TXT_01 AS VAL_STR_1 FROM WF_UTIL_COND UC WHERE UC.WF_BIZ_APP_ID = 'PFM_TEST' AND UC.COND_VAL_TXT_01 = '0' AND UC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY UC.WF_COND_LINE_NUM
SELECT #bizId# AS BIZ_ID , #userGroup# AS USER_GROUP_NAME , 000 AS USER_GROUP_LEVEL , USR_ID AS WF_USR_ID FROM WF_UTIL_USR_GRP WHERE WF_BIZ_APP_ID = 'PFM_TEST' AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
